##Project “Getting and cleaning data”

Following files are included:

1. CodeBook.Rmd: Markdown document describing the dataset, transformations and variables

2. tidy.txt: data file ready for analysis. Contains mean of the (standardized) measurements for each individual for each activity

3. run_analysis.R: R script to download, load, merge, label and aggregate the source data into the tidy.Rda data file
